markdownRemark.rawMarkdownBody: # Open Source Developer This summer I really wanted to improve my coding skills and gain some real world experience in software development. I decided that contibuting to open source would be the best way to address both my wishes. I contributed towards the back-end of the VOC Project sector, which is a transpiler that converts Python bytecode to Java bytecode. My contributions included, implementing Python built-ins in Java, developing unit tests, and creating pull requests and resolving issues on GitHub
markdownRemark.html:
Open Source Developer

This summer I really wanted to improve my coding skills and gain some real world experience in software development. I decided that contibuting to open source would be the best way to address both my wishes.

I contributed towards the back-end of the VOC Project sector, which is a transpiler that converts Python bytecode to Java bytecode.

My contributions included, implementing Python built-ins in Java, developing unit tests, and creating pull requests and resolving issues on GitHub
